name: Malware (jdparker714)
description:
This game is my submission for the BlackThornProd Gamejam #3.  The theme of the gamejam was "Less is More".  My game, "Malware," is a grid based strategy game about collecting Malware that you can use to defeat security programs and hack into the evil megacorporation Amabot.  The larger your malware army, the more likely glitches will occur.  Glitches can cause anything from swapping unit sprites, to randomly teleporting a unit, to damaging a unit.   Less units = more control over the units.  I made all of the art assets and code.  Credit to Trevor Lentz for the battle music. 

Units move then attack, so make sure to properly position your unit before ending it's movement and selecting an attack.

Manage your malware as you progress, so your party doesn't get too large and cause massive glitches!

Enjoy - JD
